channel.title: Staff Goes Online
channel.description: I need something that everytime a staff member logs in it sends a message to everyone :)

It’s PI, you need to declare the boolean for “Online message”. It’s the same for jailing someone etc…

package server;

import server.client;
import server.PlayerHandler;

item.title: Staff Goes Online
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“Get Blitz, post:7, topic:423952”]added it to playerassistant no errors but doesnt work

[code=java]

    public void onlineMessage() {
            for(Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
                    Client All = (Client)player;
                    if(All != null && c != null) {
                        if(c.playerRights == 1)
                            All.sendMessage("Mod "+c.playerName+" is now Online");
                        else if(c.playerRights == 2)
                            All.sendMessage("Admin "+c.playerName+" is now Online");
                         else if(c.playerRights == 3)
                            All.sendMessage("Owner "+c.playerName+" is now Online");
                    } else
                            System.out.println("Method tried to reach a nulled object.");
            }
    }

[/code][/quote]
thats weird. that should work right there. lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff Goes Online
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

I tried to convert it for in a class.
thought I don’t have any errors, it doesn’t work
any idea on how to fix?

package server;

import server.client;
import server.PlayerHandler;

public class LoginMsg {
	
	client c;
	
	public void onlineMessage() {
        for(Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
                client All = (client)player;
                if(All != null && c != null) {
                    if(c.playerRights == 1)
                        All.sM("Moderator "+c.playerName+" is now online.");
                    else if(c.playerRights == 2)
                        All.sM("Admin "+c.playerName+" is now online.");
                     else if(c.playerRights == 3)
                        All.sM("Owner "+c.playerName+" is now online.");
                } else
                        System.out.println("Method tried to reach a nulled object.");
        }
}

}

Read full topic

public void onlineMessage() { for(Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { Client All = (Client)player; if(All != null && c != null) { if(c.playerRights == 1) All.sendMessage(""); else if(c.playerRights == 2) All.sendMessage(""); else if(c.playerRights == 3) All.sendMessage(""); } else System.out.println("Method tried to reach a nulled object."); } }
